summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs allows veterans to get medical care from community providers when they can't access VA facilities. VA must effectively manage 5 contracts with contractors that maintain health care provider networks to deliver consistent, high-quality care—currently to 2.8 million vets. But program staff don't have clearly defined procedures, such as how to track and communicate about problems, and VA eliminated program manager...
title: Veterans Community Care Program: VA Needs to Strengthen Contract Oversight
